Internal endpoint (requires JWT). Returns aggregated error rates by component for the requested window. Do not expose publicly.
Internal endpoint (requires JWT). Response time statistics for reviews in hours. Do not expose publicly.

post.description: Handles JSON-RPC MCP client requests. For initialization, send `Accept: application/json, text/event-stream` and the server responds over SSE with `mcp-session-id` header. Use `mcp-session-id` to continue an existing session.

parameters.name: mcp-session-id
parameters.description: Session identifier returned after MCP initialization. Required for subsequent requests.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: For initialization use `application/json, text/event-stream` to allow SSE responses.

get.description: Streams MCP server notifications over SSE. Requires `Accept: text/event-stream` and a valid `mcp-session-id`.

delete.description: Terminates an MCP session by session id provided in `mcp-session-id` header.

get.description: Public endpoint. Checks application and database health and returns overall status details for monitoring.
Public endpoint. Alias for the full health check used by readiness probes.
Public endpoint. Lightweight response for quick liveness checks (no sensitive data).
Public endpoint. Alias for the simple health check used by liveness probes.

info.title: Kodus API
info.description: Public API for the Kodus platform.

data.description: Array of objects with endpoint-specific schema (see endpoint documentation).

raw.description: Raw provider payload for the current user (shape varies by integration).

data.description: Object with endpoint-specific schema (see endpoint documentation).

previousValue.description: Previous parameter value (schema varies by key).

currentValue.description: Current parameter value (schema varies by key).

organizationId.description: Optional. It will be replaced by the authenticated user organization.

contributingSuggestions.description: List of contributing suggestions (shape varies by provider).

rule.example: Avoid comparing to null; prefer strict checks or type guards.

_configValue.description: Parameter value (schema varies by config key).

configs.description: Preset configuration map (schema varies by key).

configValue.description: Parameter value (schema varies by config key).

v2PromptOverrides.description: Prompt override map (key/value by prompt identifier).

_configValue.description: Organization parameter value (schema varies by key).

data.description: Metrics visibility settings (schema varies by tenant).

cliConfig.description: CLI configuration for the team (schema varies).

members.description: Team members list (schema varies by provider).

organizationId.description: Existing organization ID. Optional when creating a new organization.

properties.description: Event properties payload forwarded to Segment.

codeReviewTimeline.description: Timeline entries for code review automation (provider-specific).

suggestionsCount.description: Suggestion counters by category/severity (shape varies by config).

suggestions.description: Suggestions grouped by file and PR level.

cliConfig.description: CLI configuration for the team (schema varies).

permissions.description: Permission map for the current user.

timestamp.description: ISO timestamp when the error occurred
